00100             function                unsafe_select( $Condition )
00101             {
00102                   try
00103                   {
00104                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00105                         
00106                         $Settings = $this->Database->select( '*' , $this->NativeTable , "$Condition" );
00107                         
00108                         return( $Settings );
00109                   }
00110                   catch( Exception $e )
00111                   {
00112                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00113                   }

00138             function                create( $Record )
00139             {
00140                   try
00141                   {
00142                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'name:string;value:string' );
00143                         
00144                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00145 
00146                         $this->Database->lock( array( $this->NativeTable ) , array( 'WRITE' ) );
00147                         
00148                         $this->Database->insert( $this->NativeTable , implode( ',' , $Fields ) , implode( ',' , $Values ) );
00149                         $this->Database->commit();
00150                         
00151                         $id = $this->Database->select( '*' , $this->NativeTable , '1 = 1 ORDER by id DESC LIMIT 0 , 1' );
00152                         $id = get_field( $id[ 0 ] , 'id' );
00153                         
00154                         $this->Database->unlock();
00155                         
00156                         return( $id );
00157                   }
00158                   catch( Exception $e )
00159                   {
00160                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00161                   }
00162             }

00186             function                get_setting( $SettingName , $DefaultValue = '_throw_exception' )
00187             {
00188                   try
00189                   {
00190                         $SettingName = $this->Security->get( $SettingName , 'command' );
00191                         $Time = time();
00192                         
00193                         $Settings = $this->unsafe_select( 
00194                               "name LIKE '$SettingName' AND date_from <= $Time AND $Time <= date_to"
00195                         );
00196                         
00197                         if( isset( $Settings[ 0 ] ) )
00198                         {
00199                               return( get_field( $Settings[ 0 ] , 'value' ) );
00200                         }
00201                         elseif( $DefaultValue === '_throw_exception' )
00202                         {
00203                               throw( new Exception( "Setting \"$SettingName\" was not found" ) );
00204                         }
00205                         else
00206                         {
00207                               return( $DefaultValue );
00208                         }
00209                   }
00210                   catch( Exception $e )
00211                   {
00212                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00213                   }
00214             }
00215             
00238             function                set_setting( $SettingName , $Value )
00239             {
00240                   try
00241                   {
00242                         $SettingName = $this->Security->get( $SettingName , 'command' );
00243                         $Time = time();
00244                         
00245                         $Settings = $this->unsafe_select( 
00246                               "name LIKE '$SettingName' AND date_from <= $Time AND $Time <= date_to"
00247                         );
00248                         
00249                         if( isset( $Settings[ 0 ] ) )
00250                         {
00251                               $id = get_field( $Settings[ 0 ] , 'id' );
00252                               $Chronological = get_package( 'database::chronological' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00253                               $Chronological->update_record( 
00254                                     $id , array( 'name' => get_field( $Settings[ 0 ] , 'name' ) , 'value' => $Value ) , $this 
00255                               );
00256                         }
00257                         else
00258                         {
00259                               throw( new Exception( "Setting \"$SettingName\" was not found" ) );
00260                         }
00261                   }
00262                   catch( Exception $e )
00263                   {
00264                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00265                   }
00266             }
